attributes.action: Allow The Pounce by The Alpha Male from TNA to be thought of as a legitimate form of punishment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Instead of letting people off scott free for minor crimes they blatantly have committed I propose this solution. The pounce is a pretty painful finishing move on a wrestling show called TNA (this will hurt the offender), coupled with the screaming of "The PoooooouuuuuuncEEEEEEEEAAAAAAAHHHH" afterwards (will add embarrassment to the offender).
The pounce should happen at a random time and place and be filmed then screened weekly to the public on a show such as 'crimewatch'. I believe this will stop minor crimes.

If you have not ever seen the pounce, go to youtube and type it in. You will be amazed.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
